main event: A witness observed an object in the middle of the back of his car while driving in Riverside, California in May 1952.
interesting points: The witness observed the object through the rear view mirror, and when he turned to show it to his parents, the object was gone.
The object was small in size and moved rapidly, disappearing quickly.
The witness described the object as a 'meteor-like' object that was reddish-orange in color and made a whining noise as it descended rapidly.
The witness could not identify the object and stated it was not a plane, satellite, or helicopter.
Multiple witnesses, including the witness's mother and sisters, also observed the object.
witnesses: a driver and his family members
